description.@en: When plans and research continually failed, all I could turn to was the Devil. I had to bring its stain into myself and beg for sight beyond seeing. So it came, blessing and cursing my mind with truths and promises of a world on fire.

effect.@en: Any time you Sleep, you may spend a Coin to gain a terrible insight as to what will pass in the next week for your character. However, you suffer from Terror at this stark realization.
